    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204510</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Polygenic traits with pennies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Polygenic Merkmale mit Pennies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traits de Polygenic avec des penny</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Traços de Polygenic com moedas de um centavo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche di Polygenic con i penny</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολυγενά γνωρίσματα με τις πένες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rasgos de Polygenic con los peniques</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Uses the results of flipping pennies to represent the functioning of polygenic traits.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwendet die Resultate des Leicht schlagens der 
Pennies, um das Arbeiten von polygenic Merkmalen darzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilise les résultats de renverser des penny pour
représenter le fonctionnement des traits polygenic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usa os resultados de lançar moedas de um centavo 
para representar funcionar de traços polygenic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usa i risultati di lanciare i penny per 
rappresentare il funzionamento delle caratteristiche polygenic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιεί τα αποτελέσματα του κτυπήματος των πενών 
για να αντιπροσωπεύσει τη λειτουργία των πολυγενών γνωρισμάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Utiliza los resultados de mover de un tirón 
peniques para representar el funcionamiento de rasgos polygenic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
